Question.Subject: how to send money online without seeing your address and full name?
Question.Content: is there a way you can send money to a person without letting him see my name and address? it's just for privacy reasons
Question.ChosenAnswer:
PayPal is a good way to send or receive money. You can setup multiple bank accounts to ur paypal setup and buy or transfer funds to other bank accounts w/ out showing personal info.
I wouldnt trust any other online site to handle transactions because paypal at least refunds your money.

Answer.Content: with xoom you setup an account (with any 'screen name') the recipient of funds only see's the screen name and not the specific account details.

PayPal is a good way to send or receive money. You can setup multiple bank accounts to ur paypal setup and buy or transfer funds to other bank accounts w/ out showing personal info.
I wouldnt trust any other online site to handle transactions because paypal at least refunds your money.
Answer.Reference: Use it all the time. U can use bank accounts w/ paypal to wire money to other accounts and they wont see your info.
